version_description:
- Fixed an issue where energy rewarded from ads was not immediately saved

This major update lets you make improvements to your drone, increasing its capabilities and adding new functionality. Master your drone's new flow to make it even further into the mysterious system.

*Powerups - Even out the odds against the glitch enemies.
*Upgrades - Use energy to improve drone and powerups.
*New emotes for holographic Alan.

This update will improve performance and solve issues with graphics, as a response to your feedback. You will also see new areas, especially if your drone makes it further into the system.
Thank you for all the downloads and reviews!

* New areas and types of obstacles.
* More quality settings.
* Graphics optimization.
* Feedback when performance is low.
* Tweaked how and when ads are shown.
* Made the beginning slightly easier.

A backdoor has been opened, giving you access to an unknown system. Put your skills to the test and start exploring this secret world. This is only the beginning.
* New game mode: Complete levels to progress on the map
* Level challenges
Fixed issue where invulnerability would immediately end after being picked up.
